data.author: ShadowZephyr

changelog.release_notes:
*General*
-Changed Week Number to comply with ISO 8601
-Added Day of Year
-Changed Month to show abbriviation only
--Moved Year down to date line

*Basalt*
-Minor Bug Fixes

-Added Watch Battery Percentage (Hidden above 40%)
-Changed layout of the date
--Added Abbreviated Day of the Week
--Reversed Month and Day
-Added missing colon in 24Hr time
-Decreased overall size of image

Original Release
-Displays Week Number (Starting at First Sunday of the Year)
-Displays the current Year
-Displays the current time in 12Hr or 24Hr time (Padded with a zero as needed)
-Displays the current month
-Displays the current day (Padded with a zero as needed)

data.description:
A simple watchface that displays the week of the year; day of the year; time (12 or 24 hour form); and the month, day, and year surmounted by the Angel Moon Crest of Hiigara.

Time display form is taken from Pebble's inbuilt toggle in the Date and Time Settings.

latest_release.release_notes:
*General*
-Changed Week Number to comply with ISO 8601
-Added Day of Year
-Changed Month to show abbriviation only
--Moved Year down to date line

*Basalt*
-Minor Bug Fixes

data.title: Hiigara
